name: 3.4.1.37. Unexpected Find (Settlement)

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: Local citizens discover a forgotten magical item. The settlement gains one temporary minor (01-70) or medium (71-100) magic item slot that is automatically filled in the next Upkeep phase. This slot and the item go away if the item is purchased or in the next Event phase, whichever comes first.
